mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EPL_TEAMS( TEAM_ID, TEAM_NAME, LOGO, KO_NAME, SEASON, RECENT_RANK, RECENT_WON, RECENT_DRAW, RECENT_LOST, RECENT_POINTS, GOALS_SCORED, GOALS_AGAINST, HOME_WON, HOME_DRAW, HOME_LOST )VALUES( #{team_id}, #{team_name}, #{logo}, #{ko_name}, #{season}, #{recent_rank}, #{recent_won}, #{recent_draw}, #{recent_lost}, #{recent_points}, #{goals_scored}, #{goals_against}, #{home_win}, #{home_draw}, #{home_lost} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TEAM_ID=#{team_id}, TEAM_NAME=#{team_name}, LOGO=#{logo}, KO_NAME=#{ko_name}, SEASON=#{season}, RECENT_RANK=#{recent_rank}, RECENT_WON=#{recent_won}, RECENT_DRAW=#{recent_draw}, RECENT_LOST=#{recent_lost}, RECENT_POINTS=#{recent_points}, GOALS_SCORED=#{goals_scored}, GOALS_AGAINST=#{goals_against}, HOME_WON=#{home_win}, HOME_DRAW=#{home_draw}, HOME_LOST=#{home_lost}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EPL_TEAMS a NATURAL JOIN Present_EPL_Season b WHERE a.SEASON = b.SEASON ORDER BY RECENT_RANK ASC
